title: Joe Jonas and Sophie Turner‚Äôs Complete Relationship and Divorce Timeline
text:
Every item on this page was chosen by an ELLE editor. We may earn commission on some of the items you choose to buy.
It seems like from almost the moment Sophie Turner and Joe Jonas met, they knew they found their person. They were engaged a year after they started dating, and married a few years after that. They've had two children together since, and seem to be constantly supporting one another through all of their projects and big life moments.
Here's the complete relationship timeline of the Game of Thrones star and DNCE musician so far.
Fans noted Turner in the background of a group shot posted to Instagram, wearing bunny ears and standing just below Jonas, who seems to be a dog of some kind.
Jonas' band DNCE performs at the MTV EMAs, and he is seen sitting next to Turner at a pre-MTV Europe Music Awards Kings of Leon concert at the Oude Luxor Theater with his arm around her. They allegedly were kissing.
Oh and they were kissing too @joejonas @SophieT #mtv #sorrynotsorry #rotterdam #MTVEMAs #netherlands @KingsOfLeon pic.twitter.com/aGaJDAWga5
They're also spotted at a friend's wedding in Malibu along with his brother Nick Jonas.
By December, their relationship seems to be official, but they're still keeping things pretty private. A source tells People, ‚ÄúThey‚Äôre dating exclusively. He was playing the field, but he really likes her and is willing to settle down for her.‚Äù
To start the new year, Turner makes things Instagram official! Turner posted a photo of Jonas riding on the back of a boat while smoking a cigar, captioning it, ‚ÄúMiami daze.‚Äù
A week later, Us Weekly reports that the pair were seen kissing at a Golden Globes after-party.
Turner posts a photo of herself looking fantastic in Louis Vuitton at the BAFTAs, as Jonas is in L.A. for the Grammys. He leaves her a fire emoji just to let her know how he feels about her look.
They were allegedly seen kissing at the Met Gala afterparty but did not walk the red carpet together.
Starting in July of that year, the couple slowly started talking more about their relationship.
‚ÄúI'm in a relationship, but it's a very private relationship,‚Äù Turner told the U.K.'s Sunday Times on July 4. She didn't say much else, except for sharing that she recently had become much more extroverted under the influence of... someone.
‚ÄúI very much isolated myself for a while and forgot what was fun. Going out with friends, going out to eat, not really having a care,‚Äù she explained. ‚ÄúAnd people I've met recently in my life have drawn me out of that. It really helps you own those insecurities. The things I tortured myself about before, I can forget about.‚Äù
On July 21, at Comic Con, Turner calls Jonas ‚Äúa good accessory‚Äù before getting flustered. 
‚ÄúI don't know, I don't know,‚Äù she tells Entertainment Weekly of Jonas rooting for her Thrones character Sansa Stark. ‚ÄúWe don't talk about it...You made me blush! Oh god, yeah! I'm sweaty, I can't tell.‚Äù
The next day, she arrives at LAX wearing a denim jacket embroidered with ‚ÄúKissing Strangers,‚Äù the name of a DNCE single.
Then, on July 25, Turner shared in an interview with Marie Claire UK that she was ‚Äúvery happy‚Äù with Jonas, but it's not easy being in public.
‚ÄúYou do feel like you're living in a fishbowl! It's frustrating [that] it's the most mundane things that make the news‚Äîhow boring! There are really no other headlines?‚Äù Turner said.
They adopt a puppy together, a Siberian Husky puppy named Porky Basquiat who currently has almost 100k followers on its own Instagram account. 
After just about a year together, they announce their engagement with matching Instagram posts featuring the pear-cut diamond on Turner's finger.
‚ÄúShe said yes,‚Äù Jonas captioned his pic. 
Turner wrote, ‚ÄúI said yes.‚Äù
In a comment, Nick Jonas wrote, ‚ÄúAhh! Congratulations to my brother‚Ä¶ and sister in law to be on your engagement. I love you both so much.‚Äù
Turner opens up about being engaged to People, saying it was fulfilling in a whole new way.
‚ÄúIt's lovely to be engaged,‚Äù she said. ‚ÄúNot like I achieved anything, but I found my person, like I'd find a house that I love and want to stay in forever. There's a sense of peace that comes with finding your person. But there's a drive that comes with your career.‚Äù
On October 3, the couple make their red carpet debut at the Louis Vuitton show during Paris Fashion Week, though it was more of a street corner. 
Turner shared a pic from inside the event, where Jonas is kissing her on the cheek.
‚ÄúWith my love in Paris,‚Äù she captioned the image.
The pair spent the holidays in London with Jonas' family, including the newly-married Nick Jonas and Priyanka Chopra. 
‚ÄúFamily,‚Äù Turner captioned the group pic of everyone enjoying dinner.
Turner says in a cover story with Glamour UK that Jonas helped her find herself again after she had an ‚Äúidentity crisis‚Äù from growing up too fast amid her Games of Throne stardom.
‚ÄúA lot of [my happiness now] is to do with being with a person I've fallen in love with, who loves me more than he loves himself, and who wants to see me find my own happiness,‚Äù she said. ‚ÄúThat was probably the biggest thing that pushed me to find who I am‚Äîand find my happiness in things other than acting.‚Äù
That same month, Turner starred in the Jonas Brothers' music video for ‚ÄúSucker‚Äù along with Kevin Jonas' wife Danielle and Nick Jonas' wife Priyanka. 
Later, she told USA Today that making the video was ‚Äúa lot more chaotic‚Äù than usual.
‚Äú[With Game of Thrones] you have to be done with this scene by a certain time, and you have to say these words and stand at exactly these spots, because otherwise it wouldn't work. Whereas with a music video, it's just much more kind of free and loose and improvisational,‚Äù she explained.
In an interview with the Sunday Times, Turner admitted they secretly broke up for about 24 hours before getting back together.
‚ÄúIt was the worst day of our lives. For a second we both had cold feet, then 24 hours later we were both, like, ‚ÄòNever mind,‚Äô‚Äù Turner said.
That month, they committed hard and had a last-minute wedding in Las Vegas at the famous A Little White Wedding Chapel just a few hours after the Billboard Music Awards. Diplo live-streamed the event on his Instagram, Dan + Shay played music, and they said their vows with Ring Pop wedding rings. While his brothers were there, they forgot to invite the parents.
‚ÄúWe had to get legally married in the states, so we thought it'd be really fun to get all of our friends, invite them out, and do an impromptu wedding,‚Äù Jonas later told GQ. ‚ÄúAnd we actually had some people that I didn't really even know that well there.‚Äù 
That month, they also walked the Met Gala red carpet together again.
On June 29, they get married again in France for a more official ceremony with everyone gathered together.
The event was held at Le Ch√¢teau de Tourreau in Sarrians, France, and Turner's Game of Thrones costar Maisie Williams was her maid of honor. Nick and Kevin stood up with their brother. 
They don't share many pics but occasionally dole out one or two for the fans. 
Turner is spotted out with Jonas in Los Angeles, and it sure looks like she has a baby bump. A source tells People, ‚ÄúThey are definitely preparing for the baby... She and Joe are both very happy.‚Äù
On July 22, 2020, Turner gives birth to the couple's first child, a baby girl named Willa. Their reps tell People, ‚ÄúSophie Turner and Joe Jonas are delighted to announce the birth of their baby.‚Äù 
Once Willa is born, Turner seems to be comfortable finally sharing pregnancy pics. She posts one in her pool with their dog, another with Jonas placing his hands on her stomach, and one of her sitting on a couch outside in her bikini.
For the couple's second wedding anniversary, Turner decides to let loose with the French wedding pics, revealing that it included a DJ set from Diplo, music from the Jonas Brothers, and a beautiful pool
Jonas makes an appearance on CBS This Morning and talks about how ‚Äúamazing‚Äù things have been during quarantine.
‚ÄúIt's been forced time at home,‚Äù he explained. ‚ÄúI'm always moving and traveling and touring. And to be in one place for a solid amount of time and just have my feet on the ground and be with my immediate family, is time I don't think I'll get back. I'm so thankful and grateful.‚Äù
The pair sell their Los Angeles home and move to Miami. Turner later tells ELLE UK that she hopes they end up in England.
‚ÄúWe're very lucky to live in Miami. We have good weather and live by the water,‚Äù she shared. ‚ÄúI really love living in America but, for my mental health, I have to be around my friends and my family. And also for my daughter‚ÄîI would love her to get the education and school life that I was so lucky to have. England would ideally be the final destination, but [Joe] might take quite a bit of convincing!‚Äù
The couple celebrate the 5th anniversary of their first date, with Jonas posting on TikTok with a montage commemorating meeting Turner for the first time.
On May 2, Turner and Jonas walk the red carpet at the Met Gala, and they're accompanied by Turner's new baby bump.   
A day later, they officially confirm the news when Turner talks about how much she loves being a mother with ELLE UK.
‚ÄúIt's what life is about for me‚Äîraising the next generation,‚Äù Turner explained. ‚ÄúThe greatest thing in life is seeing my daughter go from strength to strength. We're so excited to be expanding the family. It's the best blessing ever.‚Äù
Jonas is interviewed by People for a cover story with the Jonas Brothers, and discussed being a dad again, saying, ‚ÄúYou really don't know what to expect. I think [I'm] maybe a little less nervous [this time], but I'm just excited...It's such an amazing part of life.‚Äù
Reps tell People that the couple has welcomed another baby girl, saying, ‚ÄúJoe and Sophie are happy to announce the arrival of their baby girl.‚Äù
Jonas discusses the ‚Äúadjustment period‚Äù of work and family balance with People, admitting he's still ‚Äúlearning.‚Äù
‚ÄúIt's an adjustment period,‚Äù Jonas said. ‚ÄúJust something that I'm learning as I go, I think I can now work a little bit harder to take time off. I'm still trying to figure it out. Some weeks are a little bit more challenging than others, but it makes it a lot easier when you enjoy your gig ‚Ä¶ I wake up every day just thrilled to be able to go make music or act and create different projects and have a beautiful family, so it feels like a dream come true.‚Äù 
Turner and Jonas attend the premiere of the singer's new movie Devotion at the Toronto International Film Festival, their first red carpet appearance since the birth of their second child.
In an interview with MR PORTER, Jonas explains why privacy in his relationship with Turner is so important.
‚ÄúI want to feel like an open book,‚Äù he said. ‚ÄúBut when we started dating, I realized that I didn't have a ton of stuff that was just for me. And in the end, it makes me a better person to have something for myself.‚Äù
While talking with Ryan Seacrest, Jonas  said he asked Turner's dad for her hand in marriage, and it was nerve-wracking.
‚ÄúI was probably more nervous to ask her dad than I was to ask her,‚Äù he said. ‚ÄúYou throw it out there, and you hope that the response is good. Luckily, it went well.‚Äù
Later that month, Turner accompanied her husband as the Jonas Brothers received their star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame. During his speech at the ceremony, Jonas shouted Turner out by saying, ‚ÄúSophie, what up homie. You're my partner in crime. You keep me motivated and inspired every day. I strive to be as cool as you. You got any plans after this?‚Äù
He then mentioned his daughters, saying, ‚ÄúTo my little ones at home, Daddy loves you to the moon and back.‚Äù
Jonas and Turner had a very public date night, attending the Vanity Fair Oscar after-party together on March 12.
Turner accidentally posted a video of her and Jonas' older daughter Willa briefly to her Instagram Story. She explained in a post after why she and Jonas still intend to keep their daughters' lives as private as possible. She wrote:
‚ÄúEarlier today I made an honest mistake accidentally posting a video of our daughter on instagram stories. We have always advocated for our kids‚Äô rights to privacy so sharing this publicly is something that is against anything I stand for. Our children deserve the right to grow up out of the public eye, to learn and grow in private. If I ever were to post anything of our kids, know that it is unquestionably a mistake. I would greatly appreciate if anyone who has reposted on any other platform, please delete the video.‚Äù
In a lighter moment for the couple toward the end of May, Turner made a special appearance during Jonas' Chicken Shop Date video.

Turner posted a birthday tribute to Jonas for his 34th birthday on August 15, featuring the couple in matching pajamas. ‚ÄúHappy birthday handsome,‚Äù she wrote, tagging Jonas.
Fans of the couple noted that they'd both been recently seen without their wedding rings during the first few days of September 2023. On September 2, Jonas shared a picture with his brothers on Instagram in which his wedding ring is visible.
On September 3, TMZ reported that the couple are seeking a divorce following six months of difficulty in their relationship. Jonas has supposedly reached out to lawyers and a source claims he has been responsible for the kids the last few months while on tour as Turner films in London. The couple also recently sold their mansion in Miami after buying it just a year ago, marking a season of change.
On September 5, Jonas filed for divorce in Miami, stating in court documents that ‚Äúthe marriage between the parties is irretrievably broken.‚Äù The couple has a prenup in place, and Jonas requested joint custody of their two daughters.
Later on September 5, sources spoke to People and Page Six about what led to Jonas and Turner‚Äôs split.
‚ÄúThey were not separated but they‚Äôve been living separate lives for months,‚Äù a source who knows the couple told People, adding that they spent the summer apart. ‚Äú[They] haven‚Äôt gotten along in a while, but they‚Äôre hoping to resolve this all amicably.‚Äù 
‚ÄúAs far as custody goes, this literally all just happened, so they‚Äôre figuring it out in real time,‚Äù People‚Äôs source continued. ‚ÄúThey did have a prenup. As a family, they were based in Florida. The kids were with him the last few months, traveling with him with family while he‚Äôs been on tour. Sophie‚Äôs been working in the U.K.‚Äù
The source added that their divorce does not come as a ‚Äúsurprise‚Äù to those who know them.
Page Six spoke to a source close to the Jonas family, who described the divorce being the result of ‚Äúmany disagreements‚Äù just adding up.
‚ÄúDivorce was a last resort for Joe,‚Äù Page Six‚Äôs source said. ‚ÄúHe never wanted to break up his family, but he had to take what he felt was the best course of action for his girls.‚Äù
‚ÄúAn unhappy home isn‚Äôt a home, and the truth is that he and Sophie were going through it this year,‚Äù the source continued. ‚ÄúThere‚Äôs a lot of noise out there, but it wasn‚Äôt a straw-that-broke-the-camel‚Äôs-back situation like it‚Äôs being reported. [The disagreements] just kept building, and Joe finally reached a point where he felt that he had exhausted all options to salvage the marriage.‚Äù
During the morning, Jonas and Turner released a joint statement on their Instagram accounts confirming their separation. ‚ÄúAfter four wonderful years of marriage we have mutually decided to amicably end our marriage,‚Äù they said. ‚ÄúThere are many speculative narratives as to why but, truly this is a united decision and we sincerely hope that everyone can respect our wishes for privacy for us and our children.‚Äù
Fans also noted that during his concert in Phoenix, Arizona, on Wednesday, September 6, Jonas changed the lyrics to ‚ÄúHesitate,‚Äù a song he wrote in honor of Turner.
‚ÄúDon‚Äôt be scared because I‚Äôm on her side,‚Äù Jonas sang in footage posted to social media. The original line was ‚ÄúDon‚Äôt be scared because I‚Äôm on your side.‚Äù
He stated in the Jonas Brothers‚Äô 2020 documentary, Chasing Happiness, what the song was about.
‚Äú‚ÄòHesitate‚Äô is a song I wrote. It‚Äôs like my vows before I wrote my vows. It‚Äôs my promise to Sophie,‚Äù he said. ‚ÄúI can see in the audience when it‚Äôs definitely those other people‚Äôs songs. I see couples holding each other. I see somebody, that song got them through something.‚Äù
He continued, ‚ÄúFor me, it takes me to a whole other universe, I‚Äôm seeing her walk down the aisle again every time I close my eyes.‚Äù
On Saturday, September 9, Jonas seemed to walk back some of the statements that have been circulating about the split between himself and Turner. While on stage for a Jonas Brothers concert in Los Angeles at Dodger Stadium,  the singer stated, ‚ÄúI just wanna say, look: if you don‚Äôt hear it from these lips, don‚Äôt believe it. Okay? Thank you everyone for your love and support. Me and my family love you guys.‚Äù
‚ÄúIt‚Äôs been a tough week,‚Äù Joe Jonas says at the Jonas Brothers‚Äô Dodger Stadium Show. ‚ÄúI just wanna say, look: if you don‚Äôt hear it from these lips, don‚Äôt believe it. Okay? Thank you everyone for your love and support. Me and my family love you guys.‚Äù pic.twitter.com/6BW4ugrQ5N
Turner filed a lawsuit in New York City on September 21, claiming that Jonas was withholding their two children‚Äôs passports and keeping them from their ‚Äúhabitual residence‚Äù of England. 
Outlets widely report on the court documents and all they revealed about Jonas and Turner‚Äôs relationship and how quickly their marriage dissolved. 
Turner claimed in them that she learned about Jonas filing for divorce through the media and that they had agreed in December 2022 to make England their ‚Äúforever home.‚Äù She detailed how they had taken steps in the months after to make that transition. She also indicated her intent to file another suit in England for custody.
Jonas‚Äô rep responded to her filing with a long statement to TMZ. The rep claimed that Jonas needs to keep the children in the U.S. so he does not violate his divorce filing in Florida. ‚ÄúThe Florida Court has already entered an order that restricts both parents from relocating the children,‚Äù the rep said.
Attorneys not associated with Turner and Jonas‚Äô case told Page Six that due to their filing in two different jurisdictions, the matter isn‚Äôt likely to be resolved easily or quickly. ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs going to be a long court battle,‚Äù New York trial lawyer Aaron Richard Golub said, adding it is one that ‚Äúis going to swing like a pendulum.‚Äù
On Friday, September 22, actress Jessica Chastain reposted a tweet from author Roxane Gay. It read, ‚ÄúThe way Joe Jonas miscalculated his popularity with his transparent attempts at PR manipulation, particularly when the North remembers is FASCINATING.‚Äù
She added, ‚ÄúAnd holding the children‚Äôs passports to keep them from their mother? Bruh. And the thing is, these are not people I know or follow. I just read the ‚Äònews.‚Äô He has handled this SO badly that now I‚Äôm paying attention.‚Äù
Chastain shared the first tweet, adding a reference to Gay as ‚ÄúThe Oracle.‚Äù
The Oracle @rgay ü§ç https://t.co/RosjKuXW0m
Both Jonas and Turner signed an interim consent order that multiple media outlets obtained where they agreed to have their children remain in New York as they work through their custody case. The court agreement prohibits either from removing their daughters from the state. Page Six noted that the former couple is due to appear in court on October 3 for a pretrial conference.
In July, Jonas and Turner were looking to buy a property in Wallingford, England. As part of their attempt to close on the house, Jonas wrote a letter to the then-owner to persuade them to sell to the celebrity couple. 
The letter was shared by Page Six, and it includes a rave review of living in the U.K. from Jonas.
‚ÄúWhen my wife and I decided we were going to spend more time in the UK and search for a permanent home, our daughter expressed three unwavering requirements: having chickens, a pony and a Wendy house,‚Äù the musician allegedly stated. ‚ÄúWhile many of the houses we viewed met this criteria, the moment we turned the corner and caught sight of the charming blue shutters adorning [redacted], we experienced a sense of magic unlike anything we had felt before.‚Äù
He went on to discuss how he and Turner would live in the house, building out a music studio and working on the garden.
‚ÄúWe could tell that your family have truly loved living here and we can envision our children growing up here and making this our forever home,‚Äù the letter supposedly goes on. ‚ÄúI really think Sophie and I will be able to look after [redacted names] and for many years pay homage to the magic you have created here.‚Äù 
The sale has not closed, and their divorce commenced two months after putting down a ten percent deposit on the property.
Jonas and Turner started their 4-day mediation for child custody and their divorce. A source told Page Six that Jonas was hopeful about the mediation going in. ‚ÄúJoe is committed to making it work with Sophie in mediation and doesn‚Äôt want to put up a fight‚Äîas long as they can come to a fair agreement on the kids,‚Äù the source said. No source associated with Turner spoke out on her perspective.

title: Francia Raisa Says Selena Gomez Friendship Had a ‚ÄòRocky‚Äô Moment: ‚ÄòIt Had Nothing to Do With the Kidney‚Äô
text:
Selena Gomez‚Äôs longtime friend Francia Raisa attended Gomez‚Äôs first Rare Impact Fund benefit last night and candidly addressed their friendship history during a red carpet interview. 
Raisa donated one of her kidneys to Gomez in 2017 when she was in dire need of one due to her lupus condition. Fans speculated that Gomez and Raisa may have had a falling out after Raisa posted and deleted a shady comment following Gomez‚Äôs Rolling Stone interview last fall, where Gomez said Taylor Swift was her only friend ‚Äúin the industry.‚Äù
In July this year, Raisa shut down feud rumors, telling paparazzi, ‚ÄúThere‚Äôs no beef, guys.‚Äù
At the Rare Impact Benefit, Raisa explained to Extra that her and Gomez‚Äôs relationship, which started when they were teenagers, has had its ups and downs.
Raisa said she believed they met in 2008 ‚Äúwhen I was on Secret Life of the American Teenager on ABC Family at the time, she was on Wizards of Waverly Place. Disney had the stars of their shows come down to Children‚Äôs Hospital and visit all the kids. They put us all in groups, and she was in my group. She came up to me and was like, ‚ÄòMy mom had a teenage pregnancy, she was 16, and we love your show.‚Äô I was like, ‚ÄòOh, my God, thank you! I love your show.‚Äô And then we started talking, we both had boyfriends at the time, we started kiki-ing‚Ä¶ And then around the time that my boyfriend and I broke up, and her and her boyfriend broke up, she called me and was like, ‚ÄòI‚Äôm going through some stuff. You‚Äôve always been so nice to me. I‚Äôm going through a breakup.‚Äô I was like, ‚ÄòGirl, me, too,‚Äô and we were just inseparable after that ever since.‚Äù
Raisa said she didn‚Äôt anticipate their journey to evolve the way it did. ‚ÄúWe trauma-bonded, which is beautiful, but also it can get rocky and tricky,‚Äù Raisa continued. ‚ÄúPeople grow, relationships change. But obviously, I treat her like my little sister, she treats me like her older sister. I don‚Äôt know any relationship that‚Äôs perfect. They all go through things. So when our situation came up [with me donating her one of my kidneys], I mean, no, I never pictured that, but obviously I never regretted it. I am happy that we are here today, celebrating and supporting each other.‚Äù
Raisa added that she and Gomez have both changed a lot too. ‚ÄúI am a different person today than I was last year or even when I turned 30,‚Äù she said. ‚ÄúI‚Äôm 35 now. Even when Selena turned 30, I‚Äôm like, ‚ÄòIt‚Äôs different, isn‚Äôt it?‚Äô and she was like, ‚ÄòYeah.‚Äô I said, ‚ÄòWelcome to your 30s. Now we can get to know each other again.‚Äù
‚ÄúSometimes I feel people need to spend time apart to grow individually and then come back together. I think that‚Äôs what relationships are about,‚Äù Raisa added. She and Gomez ‚Äúhad to almost go on our own journey and grow,‚Äù she continued, ‚Äúand now I am really happy in my career now and my endeavor. I don‚Äôt know if I would be able to do that if I didn‚Äôt really take some time for myself and figure out what the hell was going on with me, because I wasn‚Äôt okay.‚Äù
Raisa clarified that her personal struggle was rooted in her childhood, not in her donating a kidney to Gomez. ‚ÄúI am okay now, and just for the record, it had nothing to do with the kidney because I don‚Äôt want any clickbait,‚Äù she said. ‚ÄúIt had nothing to do with that. I went through a lot in my childhood and I‚Äôll be talking about it very soon about exactly what happened. She has been such a huge support through all of that.‚Äù

title: All About Rich Paul, Adele's Boyfriend and One of the Biggest Sports Agents in the NBA
text:
The tables are turning for pop superstar Adele, who‚Äîdespite keeping a low profile following her divorce from Simon Konecki, which was finalized in March 2021‚Äîhas found love stateside. 
On July 24, 2021, she and sports agent Rich Paul were seen out on a date at NYC hotspot Cipriani; The Sun obtained photos. The PDA-filled photos seemed to confirm the romance, which was also confirmed by Page Six on July 20, 2021.
Only a few days before the Page Six post, they were seen together for the first time. On July 17, 2021, British singer was spotted laughing and cheering alongside Paul at Game 5 of the NBA Finals, in which the Milwaukee Bucks beat the Phoenix Suns.
Paul was apparently there alongside his client LeBron James to support friend Chris Paul, a player for the Suns. On a late-night podcast following the game‚Äôs conclusion, ESPN's Brian Windhorst seemingly confirmed the relationship between Paul and the ‚ÄúRolling in the Deep‚Äù singer.
‚ÄúRich Paul brings his girlfriend to the game to sit next to LeBron. His girlfriend is Adele," Windhorst said. "This is the first time that they‚Äôve come out in public together.‚Äù
Page Six confirmed the two were involved on Tuesday, July 20, with a source telling the outlet that Adele and Paul are ‚Äú100 percent‚Äù dating.
Not much is known about the relationship nor its impetus, but it's possible the two have been an item since as early as May 2021. In a profile of Paul for The New Yorker, interviewer Isaac Chotiner detailed the following exchange between the sports agent and Adam Mendelsohn, a friend and adviser to both Paul and James.
The ‚Äúmajor pop star‚Äù in question is almost undoubtedly Adele, and it appears the two have made their relationship official in the months since the article's release. And while Adele has, of course, received the majority of the press since the couple was spotted at Game 5, Paul has a storied career of his own. Here's what we know about the agent's background. 
Born and raised in Cleveland, Ohio, in the neighborhood of Glenville, 41-year-old Paul became a sports agent after meeting a teenaged James at the Akron-Canton Airport in 2002. Paul was wearing a Houston Oilers jersey that caught James's eye, and the two of them stayed in touch, eventually becoming such close confidantes that Paul went to work at Creative Artists Agency, under James's then-agent Leon Rose. Developing a strong business savvy, he was eventually able to strike out on his own.
Today, Paul has his own agency‚ÄîKlutch Sports Group, which he started in 2012‚Äîand is one of the most well-known agents in sports. His clients include James, Philadelphia 76ers player Ben Simmons, Los Angeles Lakers star Anthony Davis, and Golden State Warriors player Draymond Green, among a slew of others. 
Windhorst‚Äîthe podcaster and ESPN reporter who revealed Adele was Paul's ‚Äúgirlfriend‚Äù‚Äîhas written several books about James and has developed a close relationship with Paul as well. He told the New Yorker's Chotiner, ‚ÄúThe burden that Rich faces is that people question his legitimacy. They want to delegitimize him because of his race, because of his lack of education, because he used to sell jerseys out of the trunk of his car. If that‚Äôs the best they can do, they have to do a lot better.‚Äù
In March 2021, around the time Paul supposedly started ‚Äúhanging out‚Äù with Adele, The Hollywood Reporter announced that the sports agent would release a memoir titled Lucky Me. The book is a coming-of-age story to be published by Roc Lit 101, the publishing division of Jay-Z's entertainment company Roc Nation. 
The memoir will apparently follow Paul's upbringing in Cleveland, his relationship with his family, as well as his rise to the top of his field in sports. 
‚ÄúLucky Me is more than my story,‚Äù Paul revealed in a press statement. ‚ÄúLucky Me is the story of every young Black man who grew up like me. I want to use my story to uplift and inspire those who lived this and educate those who didn‚Äôt. I cannot tell you what it means to partner with my friend and mentor Jay-Z on this project. Lucky Me was the name of the book before I even spoke with Jay because his music was my life‚Äôs soundtrack.‚Äù
The first photos of the couple together were taken during the NBA Finals, though they certainly looked at ease court-side.
An eyewitness at the game told Entertainment Tonight, ‚ÄúThey had their eyes on each other almost as much as they did on the game!‚Äù
It took just days for media outlets to confirm the news that Windhorst broke: Adele and Paul truly are a couple. Page Six was told by a source that ‚Äúthey are [definitely] dating,‚Äù on July 20. Details about what their relationship is like or how they met remain private at this point.
People got a little more insight on July 20 about Adele and Paul's timeline. The outlet was told by a source that their relationship isn't brand, brand new. A source said that they've actually been dating for ‚Äúa few months.‚Äù Paul and Adele's reps didn't respond to the outlet's request for comment, a hint that the two are likely keep their relationship details as private as possible.
E! spoke to a source close to Adele in early August about why the singer has been more willing to have her romance with Paul in the spotlight. The source called their relationship ‚Äúbit of a whirlwind.‚Äù
That said, ‚Äúshe's very happy and loves being with him.‚Äù Paul is ‚Äúoutgoing‚Äù and wants to  ‚Äúout and about,‚Äù which Adele has ‚Äúembraced,‚Äù the outlet's source said. ‚ÄúShe's not as concerned about being private with her life because she's very happy with Rich.‚Äù
People was told by a source on September 1 that Paul and Adele's relationship isn't just causal anymore. ‚ÄúThey went to LeBron James' party together,‚Äù a source told the outlet. ‚ÄúHe often brings her around his friends. She seems to be getting along with everyone. They act like they are getting more serious.‚Äù
‚ÄúShe is having fun dating Rich,‚Äù the source added. ‚ÄúThey spend a lot of time together. Adele seems very happy.‚Äù
Adele slipped a picture of herself posing with Paul at a party into a slideshow of her beautiful strapless dress on Instagram. The two were at a the wedding LA Lakers star Anthony Davis.
The photo booth image shows them smiling and happy and very much in couple mode.
Rich Paul accompanied Adele to London, where she is preparing for her show at the London Palladium next week, E! News reports. This will be Adele's first show in the U.K. in four years and it's the first time Paul has joined her in her own country. They have also met one another's kids, and a source told E! in September that their relationship has ‚Äúbecome more serious in the last few months‚Äù and the singer is ‚Äúvery much in love with Rich.‚Äù
Taking him back home with her to England does seem serious. Her show will be available as an ITV special, An Audience With Adele, beginning November 21.
Adele opened up a little about Paul to Rolling Stone in the magazine's cover story about her ahead of 30's release. Celebrity gossip Instagram DeuxMoi outed her relationship with the sports agent, Adele said. ‚ÄúI didn‚Äôt really tell many of my friends at the beginning because I wanted to keep it to myself,‚Äù she said. The two first appeared together at a discount mall. ‚ÄúNone of them believed it!‚Äù
She added that Paul has met her son, and their relationship is ‚Äúincredible, openhearted, and [the] easiest [one]‚Äù she has ever been in because of the self-growth and healing she‚Äôs done.
In an interview with Oprah Winfrey during her Adele: One Night Only TV special, the singer opened up about her relationship with Paul and what makes it so special. She said it's the first time she‚Äôs truly ‚Äúloved myself and been open to loving and being loved by someone else.‚Äù So, Winfrey asked, is the lucky sports agent getting a different Adele than everyone else has gotten?
‚ÄúYeah,‚Äù Adele answered hesitantly. ‚ÄúBy arriving and turning up [for myself], maybe I‚Äôm getting a different version of him at all. It‚Äôs just timing. It‚Äôll be interesting to see what my reaction will be like in general to anything that hurts me now that I feel so secure in myself. And I‚Äôm talking outside of romance as well.‚Äù
Adele showed off her new kicks on Instagram Stories, a pair of white New Balance 550s that are a collaboration between the brand and her boyfriend, Rich Paul, even featuring his name on the sneakers' tongue.
‚ÄúCongratulations @richpaul,‚Äù she wrote across the post.
The collaboration between Paul and New Balance will also include apparel. These white shoes have a classic look and feature blue and yellow accents. Adele shared yet another image of them from further away, posting hearts over the photo.
She was also wearing a pair of cream sweatpants with blue stripes, matching the shoe's color story. 
On Thursday, December 16, the couple appeared at SoFi Stadium with Jay-Z and LeBron James' business partner Maverick Carter in a luxury suite. They were photographed holding hands by ESPN as they enjoyed the Kansas City Chiefs-L.A. Chargers game.
Who the heck are Jay-Z and Adele‚Äôs +1s???? üßê https://t.co/36XFD9Xajv
James joked about the photos on his Twitter account, quote-tweeting the images and asking, ‚ÄúWho the heck are Jay-Z and Adele‚Äôs +1s????‚Äù
Obviously, both Paul and Carter are quite well-known the the NBA star.
Adele and Paul's relationship quietly remains on and strong. While the two were apart on Adele's 34th birthday, People reports the couple had dinner in Napa Valley on May 8.
‚ÄúAdele is still seeing Rich,‚Äù a source said. ‚ÄúThey are both very busy though. She is working on her residency and Rich is busy with his clients. They see each other when they can.‚Äù
On June 25, Adele and Rich Paul attended Cleveland Cavaliers star Kevin Love and Sports Illustrated Swimsuit model Kate Bock‚Äôs wedding at the New York Public Library. A photo of them in their full glam was posted to LeBron James' Instagram account. They stood as a couple across from James and his wife, Savannah James.
Adele wore an off-the-shoulder black gown that ended at just her ankles and which was draped with sheer tulle fabric. She was wearing pointed black pumps and carried a black clutch. Paul was in a black tuxedo tailored to fit the Great Gatsby theme of the evening with a classic fit.
James captioned the photo, ‚ÄúICONIC.‚Äù 
On June 11, 2022, during interview with E! News, Paul seemed to hint that he'd be open to having more children and being an ‚Äúolder dad.‚Äù
‚ÄúAs a young dad, growing a business, it was pretty tough,‚Äù he said. ‚ÄúBut now looking as an older dad and my kids being much older, and obviously, if I was to have more kids ... I'm looking forward to being a different dad, a more patient dad.‚Äù
In an interview with BBC Radio Four's Desert Island Discs on July 1, 2022, Adele said she'd ‚Äúdefinitely like a couple more kids‚Äù with Paul. She has one child now, nine-year-old son Angelo, who she shares with her ex-husband, Simon Konecki.
‚ÄúI would definitely love a couple more kids,‚Äù she said. ‚ÄúIt would be wonderful. If not, I've got Angelo.‚Äù
Adele has mentioned wanting to have more children before, saying in an interview on the Graham Norton Show in February that her recently cancelled Caesars Palace Las Vegas residency would ‚Äúabsolutely 100% happening this year.‚Äù
She explained, ‚ÄúIt has to happen this year because I've got plans for next year. Imagine if I have to cancel because I am having a baby!‚Äù
During a late August Las Vegas residency show, Adele spoke to two fans about her hope to have another child on the sooner side. ‚ÄúI really want to be a mom again soon, so every time I see a name I like, I write it down in my phone,‚Äù Adele said, via Entertainment Tonight. ‚ÄúI can't say Parker because Rich likes that name.‚Äù Adele noted that she likes the names Ray and Spencer.
Adele was featured on the cover of ELLE's September issue, where she gushed about how her relationship with the sports agent is unlike anything she's ever experienced.
‚ÄúI've never been in love like this. I'm obsessed with him,‚Äù she announced. When asked if she'd consider remarrying following her divorce from ex-husband Simon Konecki, Adele answered, ‚ÄúYes, absolutely.‚Äù
She went to say, ‚ÄúI definitely want more kids. I'm a homemaker and I'm a matriarch, and a stable life helps me with my music. But right now, all I got in my brain is [my upcoming Las Vegas residency]. I wanna f*cking nail it.‚Äù
Paul celebrated his 41st birthday on December 16, 2022. Adele serenaded her sweetheart while on stage at The Colosseum at Caesars Palace in Las Vegas. She sang him "Happy Birthday," and naturally, it went viral. Fans took to Twitter to share the wholesome moment.
‚ÄúIt‚Äôs my boyfriend‚Äôs birthday today, and I love him more than life itself,‚Äù she said. ‚ÄúCan we wish him happy birthday?‚Äù
singing happy birthday to rich. That was actually so beautifulü•∫‚ô•Ô∏è pic.twitter.com/yeJyBffJS6
Adele played coy when she sparked Paul engagement rumors last February by wearing a diamond ring on her left ring finger to the BRIT Awards. She said, days after on the Graham Norton Show while still wearing the ring, ‚ÄúIf I was [engaged], would I ever tell anyone if I was or wasn't?‚Äù 
A year later at the end of February 2023, unverified celeb gossip Instagram DeuxMoi claimed that Adele and Paul really were engaged and planning to get married in the summer, per a ‚Äúreliable source.‚Äù DeuxMoi did not disclose who this source was or what makes them reliable, however, and Adele has not ever confirmed her engagement. It's just more fodder to the engagement rumor.
Adele and Paul had a casual date on Friday, April 28, attending the NBA game at the Crypto.com Arena in Los Angeles where the city's Lakers and the Memphis Grizzlies were facing each other in the playoffs. The singer was wearing a grey tracksuit from Klutch Athletics, her fianc√©'s sportswear brand he co-authored with New Balance. Though the outfit was relaxed, she had on some glam makeup, including a smokey eye and dark lipstick. 
Paul was also in a tracksuit set, this one in patterned white and green with a zippered jacket.  
On Saturday, May 6, the couple were seen on another date at the Crypto Arena in Los Angeles for the 2023 NBA playoffs. The singer was wearing a two piece made of flowing tan fabric with loose slacks and matching button down. She paired the look with black sandal heels and hold hoops that matched her necklaces and bracelets. Paul wore a black tracksuit with green details over a white t-shirt underneath and a pair of colorful sneakers. They were seated next to actress Nia Long and the stadium was full of other celebrities, including Leonardo DiCaprio, Kim Kardashian, Rob Zombie, Kevin Hart, and Michael B. Jordan.
The couple has been regularly calling each other husband and wife despite not being married, and Adele has made headlines for doing it during her Las Vegas residency.
A source told Us Weekly that Paul actually started calling Adele his wife two months into dating.
‚ÄúThey aren‚Äôt married but they do call each other husband and wife and have been for a while now,‚Äù the source said. ‚ÄúAdele loved the security [of it] and how much he adores her.‚Äù

title: The Real Reason Adele Has Been Calling Rich Paul Her ‚ÄòHusband‚Äô
text:
Adele has regularly been calling Rich Paul her ‚Äúhusband‚Äù during her Las Vegas residency, sparking rumors that the couple may have secretly tied the knot. But they haven‚Äôt, a source told Us Weekly. It‚Äôs just a term of endearment. In fact, Paul started calling Adele his ‚Äúwife‚Äù two months into dating, the source said.
‚ÄúThey aren‚Äôt married but they do call each other husband and wife and have been for a while now,‚Äù the source continued. ‚ÄúAdele loved the security [of it] and how much he adores her.‚Äù
Adele and Paul have been dating since 2021. They sparked engagement rumors in February 2022 when Adele wore a big diamond ring on her left ring finger at the BRIT Awards. When asked about the rumors while wearing the ring again during her Graham Norton Show appearance, Adele said, ‚ÄúIf I was [engaged], would I ever tell anyone if I was or wasn‚Äôt?‚Äù
ELLE asked Adele about the engagement rumors months later in August 2022. At first, she dodged the question, saying: ‚ÄúWell! Well. Well, I‚Äôm not married. I‚Äôm not married.‚Äù Then she added, ‚ÄúI‚Äôm just in loooove! I‚Äôm happy as I‚Äôll ever be. I might as well be married.‚Äù
She later clarified in another conversation for the piece that ‚ÄúI‚Äôm not engaged. I just love high-end jewelry, boy!‚Äù 
Adele most recently sparked secret marriage headlines when she rejected a fan‚Äôs proposal to her during her Vegas residency. ‚ÄúYou can‚Äôt marry me, I‚Äôm straight, my love. And my husband‚Äôs here tonight. He‚Äôs here,‚Äù she said.

title: Selena Gomez Wore Two Minidresses and One Glitzy Gown at Her Rare Impact Fund Gala
text:

Selena Gomez hosted her first Rare Impact Fund benefit last night, and the singer leaned into extravagant dressing. The star wore three dresses throughout the night, starting with a custom Valentino silver floor-length gown on the red carpet with Messika dangle earrings. 
Gomez switched into minidresses for the rest of the night. Next, she wore a purple floral one by Rahul Mishra  on the red carpet.
Inside the gala, she switched into a floral Monse minidress with a zebra print when speaking on stage.
Her friend and kidney donor Francia Raisa wore a matching silver gown with her on the red carpet. Raisa told Extra the two hadn‚Äôt coordinated outfits on purpose: ‚ÄúThe only thing we coordinated was our spray tans, [which we got together],‚Äù she said. ‚ÄúWe didn‚Äôt talk about our dress.‚Äù
She also addressed their friendship following past feud rumors, saying, ‚ÄúWe trauma bonded [when we first met as teens over exes], which is beautiful, but also it can get rocky and tricky. People grow, relationships change, obviously I treat her like my little sister she treats me like her older sister. I don‚Äôt know any relationship that‚Äôs perfect. When our situation came up‚Äîno, I never pictured that, but obviously I never regretted it. I am happy that we are here today celebrating and supporting each other.‚Äù
Of their evolution, she said, ‚ÄúI am a different person today than I was last year or even when I turned 30, I‚Äôm 35 now, even when Selena turned 30, I‚Äôm like, ‚ÄòIt‚Äôs different isn‚Äôt it?‚Äô and she was like, ‚ÄòYeah.‚Äô I said, ‚ÄòWelcome to your 30s, now we can get to know each other again.‚Äù
Gomez spoke to People at the event about feeling more at ease in her 30s. ‚ÄúNow that I‚Äôm 30, I care less, so it‚Äôs actually nice,‚Äù she said. ‚ÄúI get to focus on the things that actually matter, and I‚Äôm not worried about things that were holding me back.‚Äù
Regarding the benefit, Gomez said, ‚ÄúIt is my first time throwing something and I hate asking people for money, so I don‚Äôt know. It‚Äôs like a weird concept, but I know that we‚Äôre doing a good thing and I couldn‚Äôt be more lucky to have the platform to do that.‚Äù 
Her Rare Impact Fund donates to mental health organizations, which you can learn more about here. A portion of all sales from Gomez‚Äôs beauty line Rare Beauty go toward the fund. 
Gomez and the Rare Beauty team launched the brand with the goal of raising $100 million for the fund over the course of 10 years to help increase access to mental health resources for young people.

title: A Complete Timeline of Rihanna and A$AP Rocky‚Äôs Relationship
text:
Every item on this page was chosen by an ELLE editor. We may earn commission on some of the items you choose to buy.
Rihanna and her longtime friend A$AP Rocky became much more than friends about three years ago; they welcomed their first child together in 2022. The two have been close since A$AP joined Rihanna‚Äôs Diamond Tour in 2013. The singer also starred in A$AP's music video ‚ÄúFashion Killa‚Äù later that year.
Rumors of A$AP and Rihanna's romance first started shortly after Rihanna split from billionaire boyfriend Hassan Jameel in January 2020, after three years together. A source told People then that ‚Äútheir lives were too different, and it was hard to maintain a relationship.‚Äù Shortly after their breakup, Rihanna was seen hanging out with A$AP Rocky more often. A$AP previously dated Kendall Jenner in 2016; their relationship ended in 2017 
Here's everything we know about the power couple, from when they were first speculated to be in a relationship to how they're doing as new parents at the start of 2023.
On December 2, the pair walked the British Fashion Awards red carpet in London. Rihanna wore a Fenty mint green satin dress with matching gloves and wrap, paired with a diamond-studded choker necklace. A$AP sported an all-black tux with sneakers. Janet Jackson presented Rihanna's first fashion award for her Urban Luxe nomination.
Rihanna and A$AP sparked tabloid dating rumors days after her split from Hassan Jameel was reported. According to Entertainment Tonight, Rihanna and A$AP attended the Yams Day Benefit Concert in Brooklyn together.
A source suggested the two were dating to The Sun, telling the British outlet, ‚Äúthey‚Äôre really enjoying each other‚Äôs company and taking things easy as it‚Äôs still early days.‚Äù
Shortly after The Sun's report came out, E! shut down the romance speculation. A source told E!, ‚ÄúRihanna is single. She just got out of a long intense relationship with Hassan. She's wants to be single and isn't going to jump into something. She's hanging out with A$AP Rocky, but she is not dating him. They have a long history and she's just having fun.‚Äù
Months after dating rumors were initially denied, A$AP appeared alongside Rihanna in Fenty Skin's ad cameo. The ad also featured Lil Nas X, Tommy Genesis, and Halima Aden.
Rihanna interviewed the ‚ÄúEveryday‚Äù rapper in a GQ YouTube video. A$AP answered questions about his skincare routine, throwback outfits, and Fenty Skin. When asked about the most challenging part of working with Rihanna, the rapper said, ‚ÄúI think the hardest part about working with you is not goofin' off and laughing the whole time. Like, this shit is comedy.‚Äù A$AP continued, ‚ÄúThe hardest part is not having too much fun. You just forget that it's still work at the end of the day.‚Äù
On November 28, the rumored couple was spotted out with a group of friends at the Beatrice Inn in New York. According to Page Six, the two were ‚Äúseated discreetly behind a curtain.‚Äù
A couple of days later, People confirmed that Rihanna and A$AP Rocky are officially dating. The source did not provide details about the couple's timeline or how serious their relationship is.
On December 1, a source gave Entertainment Tonight details about Rihanna and A$AP's relationship.
‚ÄúThey have always had amazing chemistry, and Rihanna relates to A$AP, and it [their relationship] feels natural, easy and fun,‚Äù the source said. ‚ÄúShe feels very comfortable around him since they‚Äôve known each other for such a long time and also feels a connection to him because his dad is from Barbados.‚ÄùAccording to People, the couple had been inseparable for weeks. A source told the outlet that ‚Äúit's a new relationship, but they both seem very into it.‚Äù A$AP's lifestyle as a famous musician worked with Rihanna's. ‚ÄúThey've always seemed to have a great time together,‚Äù the source said. ‚ÄúThey have a lot in common.‚Äù
Us Weekly reported that the ‚ÄúGoldie‚Äù rapper ‚Äúhas been very into Rihanna for years and was always the instigator in their flirtatious connection,‚Äù according to a source. The source also mentioned that Rihanna ‚Äúwould brush off his advances and kept him in the friend zone‚Äù until now.
‚ÄúThings changed over the summer, and they finally hooked up. They've been together ever since,‚Äù Us's source said.
The couple became more serious as the Grammy-nominated rapper flew to Barbados to join Rihanna and her family for the holidays. According to People, the pair spent Christmas together.
Entertainment Tonight was told by a source that ‚Äúspending Christmas together was an obvious step‚Äù for their relationship. The source said being longtime friends makes it easier to ‚Äúget along, travel together, and be involved in each other‚Äôs lives to the full extent. They always have such a good time together and definitely seem in love.‚Äù
On December 24, the low-key couple was photographed by paparazzi in Barbados. TMZ shared a photo of the pair hand-in-hand as they walked to the pier, seemingly confirming their relationship.
Later that month, paparazzi caught more affectionate moments between the new couple. Rihanna and A$AP were spotted sharing a kiss while enjoying their Catamaran cruise, according to TMZ. The outlet shared a video of the pair jet skiing and tubing alongside Rihanna‚Äôs friends.
On January 18, the couple and friends celebrated Yams Day, an annual celebration of A$AP Rocky‚Äôs late friend and business partner A$AP Yam, who died in 2015. E! reported details of the night as the couple arrived separately.
‚ÄúRihanna arrived with a group of friends and met A$AP Rocky there,‚Äù a source told the outlet. ‚ÄúThey entered the restaurant through different doors and tried to be discreet. A$AP Rocky entered behind a bodyguard and ducked inside quickly. Once everyone arrived, they sat together with a group of friends.‚Äù
The source said that the group had dinner and shared stories throughout the evening: ‚ÄúThere was lots of food passed around the table and laughter coming from inside. They stayed for over two hours before leaving separately.‚Äù Rihanna and A$AP left separately.
The couple made a rare sighting in Los Angeles on April 12. The paparazzi photographed the pair leaving dinner at Delilah in matching leather outfits. Rihanna wore a brown leather coat, and A$AP wore a black leather jacket paired with leather pants. It was confirmation that their romance remained very much on a year into the coronavirus pandemic.
In a GQ interview, Rocky opened up about his relationship with the Barbadian singer for the first time. In the interview, he referred to Rihanna as ‚Äúthe love of my life‚Äù and ‚Äúmy lady.‚Äù
The rapper did not share when the two began their relationship, but he did discuss what dating Rihanna is like versus playing the field. It's ‚Äúso much better when you got the One. She amounts to probably, like, a million of the other ones,‚Äù Rocky said. ‚ÄúI think when you know, you know. She‚Äôs the One.‚Äù
He also spoke about their trip together to Barbados during the holidays. ‚ÄúIt was crazy. I always imagined what it would be like for my dad before he came to America. And I got to visit those places, and believe it or not, and there was something nostalgic about it. It was foreign but familiar,‚Äù he said.
On June 23, the couple was photographed sharing a kiss at Barcade in New York City, a rare PDA moment for them. Rihanna wore a sheer pink high-leg slit dress with a furry hot pink hat. Rocky wore a leather jacket, maroon tank, and leather pants. Later that night, the paparazzi captured the couple leaving the venue as Rihanna wore Rocky‚Äôs leather coat with his arms around her.
A few days later, TMZ posted a video of the couple depicting one of Rocky's grand gestures for his lady. TMZ posted Rocky sweeping Rihanna off her feet as he carried her through New York City‚Äôs Lower East Side. According to the outlet, the couple spent the night and early morning partying together.
Rihanna and A$AP went for a date night in Miami at the World Famous House of Mac, where they took photos with the restaurant‚Äôs owner, Derrick Turton, who is also Pitbull‚Äôs former manager.
They cuddled up for photos, obtained by The Daily Mail, in which A$AP wrapped his arm around Rihanna‚Äôs shoulder. She put both arms in a hug around his waist. It looked like a very happy night out.
In August, the couple enjoyed a date night in NYC, which eventually led to the night club Pergola, where they were photographed leaving at 5 A.M. Rihanna wore a Harley Davidson handkerchief top with very ripped jeans and sandal heels.
Rihanna and A$AP Rocky walked the red carpet of the Met Gala together, an event where the singer would typically make a splash on her own. The theme for the 2021 Met Gala was American Fashion. Rihanna wore a dramatic black ruffle dress from Balenciaga with a beanie and over 267 carats worth Bulgari diamonds. Rocky arrived wearing a patchwork, blanket-like ensemble that looked very cozy.
Rihanna and A$AP Rocky revealed they're expecting their first child together. The two appeared out in New York City, Rihanna showing off her pregnant stomach to paparazzi at the end of the month.
Rihanna showed off some of her famously sexy and flattering maternity wear at the photocall for her Fenty Beauty and Fenty Skin party held at Goya Studios in Los Angeles. Rocky was by her side, and the couple smiled and embraced one another for the cameras on the red carpet.
Rihanna wore a shredded green halter top with a backless design, over a pair of pants of the same material in a silver-to-purple ombr√© pattern. Rihanna's jewelry for the night included amethyst drop earrings, a silver bracelet with violet stones, and a series of Messika rings, including their Wild Moon ring, the Bague Diamond Catcher, and the Messika Bague Exotic Charm ring.
For her makeup, the singer and beauty mogul wore a bright red lip, shimmering gold eyeshadow, and her long hair down and parted to the side.
A$AP Rocky wore Louis Vuitton, a letterman jacket with a matching shirt, a purple Yankees hat to match his girlfriend, and a pair of shredded denim jeans with green sneakers.
The event came with an announcement that Savage x Fenty would be launching retail stores with flagships in Los Angeles, Houston, Philadelphia, and Virginia, according to Forbes, and planned to open ten stores. 
Engagement rumors circulated when the pregnant singer was photographed out wearing a stunning diamond ring on her left ring finger.
When photographed with the ring, Rihanna was out shopping for baby clothes in Los Angeles' Kitson, in a vintage Grave Digger monster truck T-shirt with jeans, a statement hat that read ‚ÄúSex is safer than smoking,‚Äù and a Gucci Balenciaga purse. 
A couple days later, paparazzi asked Rihanna about the ring she was wearing and she laughed and teased, via The Daily Mail, ‚ÄúThis old ring?‚Äù
This was a tough month for the couple after Rocky was arrested for a connection to a shooting in Hollywood in November 2021. He was taken in by the Los Angeles Police Department on April 20. The arrest came shortly after the couple landed back in California after visiting family in Barbados. He posted his $550,000 bail and was released just hours later. 
After the arrest, Rihanna allegedly canceled her baby shower, and a source told Us Weekly that she ‚Äúhasn't spoken much about [the arrest]. She's truly focused on her pregnancy and not trying to get too stressed.‚Äù
The insider added, ‚ÄúShe is very confident about everything and has told friends she just hopes for a positive outcome.‚Äù
A$AP was accused of being involved with a shooting near Selma and Argyle Avenues following an argument. A man alleged that he was approached by the rapper at around 10:15 P.M. on November 6 and that A$AP fired a handgun at him three or four times. The victim's left hand was grazed by a bullet, and he sought medical treatment. 
‚ÄúRihanna was there when Rocky was arrested and has been crying non-stop,‚Äù another source claimed to The Sun. ‚ÄúShe's heavily pregnant and these are very serious accusations, it's a nightmare scenario for her...It was meant to be Rihanna's baby shower in LA on Wednesday night, but they had to cancel.‚Äù
The source said, ‚ÄúRihanna was very, very upset and stressed by Rocky's arrest. It's not the best time for her to be on such an emotional rollercoaster.‚Äù
That same month, gossip spread on Twitter that A$AP Rocky cheated on his pregnant girlfriend with shoe designer Amina Muaddi during May's Paris Fashion Week, but TMZ got clarification from a source directly connected to Rocky and Rihanna on the rumor's validity. It's absolutely not true, the source said.
The source said, ‚Äú100% false on both counts,‚Äù adding again that it's ‚Äú1 million percent not true. They're fine.‚Äù 
Rihanna and A$AP Rocky's  ‚Äúvery fly‚Äù baby arrived. Rihanna gave birth to a baby boy on May 13 in Los Angeles, TMZ reported. The baby's name  was not immediately shared.
A source close to the couple told People that the two were home in Los Angeles with him. ‚ÄúRihanna is doing well. They are very excited to be parents. Rihanna is already a wonderful mom,‚Äù the source said.
It's announced that Rihanna will be headlining the Super Bowl Halftime Show in 2023.
‚ÄúRihanna is excited for her Super Bowl performance,‚Äù the source told ET. ‚ÄúShe is trying to stay on the healthier side and feel good and fit ahead of it.‚Äù
Rihanna herself told ET's Rachel Smith that she had a form of buyer's regret after the halftime news was announced.
‚ÄúI can‚Äôt believe I even said yes,‚Äù she explained. ‚ÄúIt was one of those things that like, even when I announced it I was like, ‚ÄòI can‚Äôt take it back now. It‚Äôs final. I can‚Äôt believe... what did I just get myself into?‚Äô Because the Super Bowl is one of the biggest stages in the world. It‚Äôs an entertainer's dream to be on the stage like that, but it's nerve-racking. You wanna get it right. You know everybody's watching. And they're rooting for you, and I wanna get it right. It's a challenge I was willing to accept. Being a new mom, nothing would have gotten me out of the house if it wasn't a challenge like that.‚Äù
She added, ‚ÄúIt was now or never. Yeah, for sure. For sure. You can get real comfortable at home as a mom.‚Äù
She then shared a little about what her daily mom experience has been like and her favorite part.
‚ÄúOh my god, the mornings, like, seeing his morning face!‚Äù Rihanna declared. ‚ÄúSeeing a baby with, like, little bags and waking up and they're just, like, startled. They're trying to figure out where they‚Äôre at. It's the cutest, it's my favorite part of the day.‚Äù
The Grammy-winning singer walked the red carpet with A$AP at the premiere of Marvel's Black Panther: Wakanda Forever, their first time at a red carpet event since the birth of their son. Rihanna's singles ‚ÄúLift Me Up‚Äù and ‚ÄúBorn Again‚Äù appeared on the soundtrack for Ryan Coogler's Marvel sequel.
The premiere was held at the Los Angeles' Dolby Theatre, where Rihanna wore a sparkly, strapless dress by designer Rick Owens and a pair of opera gloves and matching pointed-toe heels.
Rocky matched his girlfriend in tone with an  oversized khaki jacket and matching pants with a black T-shirt underneath. 
A source told Entertainment Tonight that Rihanna hopes to expand her family with A$AP Rocky someday.
They added she has ‚Äúdreamed of being a mom,‚Äù and would ‚Äúlove nothing more‚Äù than to have more kids with the rapper.
‚ÄúRihanna and A$AP are so in love and have the best time together,‚Äù the source added. ‚ÄúThey are also a great team when it comes to being parents to their baby boy. Rihanna always dreamed of being a mom and she takes a lot of pride in it. She would love to have more children with A$AP in the future.‚Äù
Rihanna shared her baby's face for the first time with a debut TikTok video.
In the adorable video, the baby is strapped in his car seat and smiling and gurgling as Rihanna speaks to him off-camera. She asks him, ‚ÄúYou tryna get Mommy's phone?‚Äù
He smiles in response.
Rihanna captioned the video, ‚ÄúHacked.‚Äù
In an interview with Zane Lowe on Apple Music 1, Rocky shared what it's been like to be a dad and share a family with Rihanna.
‚ÄúOh, man,‚Äù he said when first asked about Rihanna's upcoming halftime show. ‚ÄúI‚Äôm just as excited as you guys, if not more. Yeah, I‚Äôm super excited. This is as huge. This is incredible. I‚Äôm so glad that my lady‚Äôs back making music again and whatnot, and getting back out there. It‚Äôs just incredible. Especially for both of us, it is a good year for both of us to be more active and be out there. But the Super Bowl is huge, and her being the creative she is she going to bring it, man. I‚Äôm excited. I‚Äôm more excited than everybody else, honestly.‚Äù
He went. onto say about fatherhood, ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs so unexplainable. It‚Äôs just one of those things. I‚Äôm a member of our club now, like the dad club. You see a dad, you see me. I‚Äôm playing on, I‚Äôm a full dad now. Being outside and working and being creative, it drives more energy for you‚Ä¶to think and soak things up like a sponge now that I‚Äôm a dad, because I have a whole ‚Äònother perspective. But it honestly helps you get home to your family and get home to your baby. And I can‚Äôt even explain it, man. You come home to heaven every day. I‚Äôm so thankful. God is good, man.‚Äù
That same month, the couple made a glamorous appearance at the Golden Globe awards, where Rihanna was nominated for Best Original Song, Motion Picture. Rihanna wore a gorgeous black gown by Schiaparelli couture and accessorized with Giuseppe Zanotti shoes and a Cartier diamond necklace and earrings. 
Okay, this is major now. Rihanna and Rocky are in the building. (I saw RiRi laughing at Jennifer Coolidge‚Äôs Bill Nye joke). #GoldenGlobes pic.twitter.com/HAOst2nygD
The I C ‚≠êN  I C @rihanna and @asvpxrocky are in the building! #GoldenGlobes pic.twitter.com/UUgzfVaIkg
As Rihanna got ready for her Super Bowl performance, she was working extremely hard to prepare. 
A source told ET, ‚ÄúRihanna has been preparing for her Super Bowl LVII halftime show for months and wants it to be the most iconic performance. She really kicked things into gear and got right to work after she received the call.‚Äù
They also explained she's been non-stop in the studio and has been ‚Äúvery hands on with every detail throughout the entire process.‚Äù
‚ÄúIt is super exciting for her to get back out there and perform since having her son and she feels rejuvenated after taking some time off,‚Äù they explained. 
To do all of this, especially with an eight-month-old son, Rihanna has been receiving a lot of support from her boyfriend. 
‚ÄúA$AP has been very supportive throughout her preparation and has really been stepping up his parenting game while she has been busy with rehearsals,‚Äù the source said. ‚Äú[A$AP] and her son plan to be there supporting her during her big day.‚Äù
During the Super Bowl, Rihanna announced her second pregnancy with A$AP Rocky.
She spoke in a British Vogue interview published days later about their relationship being strengthened with the arrival of their baby boy. ‚ÄúWe‚Äôre best friends with a baby,‚Äù she said with a laugh. ‚ÄúWe have to be on the same page, but we‚Äôve always kind of had that in our relationship. Everything changes when you have a baby but I wouldn‚Äôt say it‚Äôs done anything but made us closer.‚Äù
Rihanna and Rocky continued making appearances out and about as a couple. Rocky joined Rihanna at the Oscars where she performed, and footage went viral of him cheering for her at the ceremony.
It‚Äôs Asap Rocky always cheering her on for meüòçüò©ü•πü§© #Oscars2023 #Oscar #Oscars pic.twitter.com/PV1j5zlwYb
They were also photographed together backstage, with Rocky touching her baby bump:
Rihanna gave fans a rare look at her and Rocky's son for his first Easter with the family: 
Rocky dropped his second hint of summer 2023 that he and Rihanna may be married with the release of his song ‚ÄúRiot.‚Äù His lyrics included, ‚ÄúMy wife is erotic, I'm smokin' exotic (Woo, woo) / My whip is exotic, my crib is a cottage (Woo, woo, woo).‚Äù In the second verse, he teased a potential music project with her: ‚ÄúNew collab' with my baby mom (Woo, woo, woo),‚Äù and he also name-dropped her later in the song: ‚ÄúPass on a sweetie, I got me a RiRi.‚Äù
Neither Rocky nor Rihanna commented on the marriage rumors or confirmed them. In June, Rocky had called Rihanna his ‚Äúwife‚Äù during a Cannes performance.
On July 31, a source spoke to Entertainment Tonight about how the couple was now in Los Angeles, awaiting the birth of their second child who was due any day at that point.
Rihanna and Rocky ‚Äúare each other‚Äôs rock,‚Äù the source said, adding that they have ‚Äúbeen really great about prioritizing their relationship even as busy parents,‚Äù per the outlet.
Rihanna and Rocky welcomed their second son on August 1 in Los Angeles. The news came out publicly weeks later.
A source told People on August 22 that ‚ÄúRihanna feels her family is now complete.‚Äù Being a parent to two children, ‚Äúit‚Äôs something she‚Äôs always wanted.‚Äù
